name: Churip
storyline:
My sister passed away.
On the day of the funeral, her casket was beautifully adorned with many flowers.

Since then, I have been sorting through her belongings.

She often appears in my dreams as she was when she was alive.
Lately, I even feel her presence.

Is this just an illusion, or has she become a ghost and come to see me?

Please rest in peace.
summary: "CHURIP" is a horror adventure game set in modern times. On the day of the funeral, her casket was beautifully adorned with many flowers. She often appears in my dreams as she was when she was alive.
